ABOUT_DEVS: Developed by Sukhveer Kaur & Edwin Biemond for Ratwara Sahib Ji
HOME_TEXT_1: VGRMC Trust was founded by Sant Waryam Singh Ji inspired by his mentor Sant Isher Singh Ji of Rara Sahib.
HOME_TEXT_2: The Samparada is linked with Bhai Sahib Bhai Daya Singh Ji, Leading Piara of the Five, selected by Guru Gobind Singh Ji.
HOME_TEXT_3: Sant Maharaj Ji founded Gurmat Parchar Centre, Gurudwara Isher Parkash at Ratwara Sahib in 1986 for spreading Gurmat (Sikh Teachings) in India and abroad
HOME_TEXT_4: Started publishing monthly magazine 'ATAM MARG' in 1995
HOME_TEXT_5: published books and brought out audio-videos
